summary: Diff adds a new MultiCharacterQuestionnaireDialog with family-role/gender grouping and integrates an entry point on CharactersPage. It also appears to add a React Query helper for creating multiple characters with cache invalidation, and includes a DRAFT_BUILD.md with build/test instructions. Several unrelated changes (book setup questionnaire integration, branding, backend access control/user profiles) are present but not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Produce and deploy a new draft build of the app after implementing the multi-character questionnaire update so the user can test it.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes only a markdown document describing how to build/deploy, but does not provide evidence that a new draft build was actually produced and deployed.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile storage and access-control/authorization enforcement added/modified.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; BuildRequest focuses on a new multi-character questionnaire and character creation flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Book setup questionnaire integration and project creation flow changes (auto-opening/reopening setup questionnaire).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly a non-goal to avoid redesigning unrelated sections beyond whatâ€™s necessary for the questionnaire entry point.

hallucinated_features.description: App-wide branding/header changes ("Legendary Lovers Library" branding, Heart icon, unauthenticated hero illustration).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest; unrelated to the Characters multi-character questionnaire feature.
